QuestData.Title: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Fiery Core
QuestData.CompletionText: Woe unto those that tempt fate inside the Molten Core. Death comes swiftly - the punishment dealt without mercy.$B$BMany of the Brotherhood have been lost in their search for Fiery Cores.$B$BOffer 1 Fiery Core and you shall be granted favor amongst the Brotherhood.
QuestData.RewardText: Your offering has been accepted. Favor you have gained. Continue and you shall be allowed access to the ancient trades.
